Ref:
When you pass the logical ID of this resource to the intrinsic Ref function, Ref returns the ImageArn.

For more information about using the Ref function, see Ref.

GetAtt.Description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the image.  Type: String  Length Constraints: Maximum length of 256.  Pattern: ^arn:aws(-[\w]+)*:sagemaker:.+:[0-9]{12}:image/[a-z0-9]([-.]?[a-z0-9])*$
